name: contoured
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
designed to closely follow or fit around the curved surface or shape of something: contoured to They developed a new medical scanner that is more contoured to the shape of the body. The contoured sole of the cycling shoe gives an incredible fit.
having smooth curves: We love the car's sleek, contoured design. The underwear gives your body a smoother, more contoured appearance.
geography
  specialized (of a map) having lines that join points of equal height or depth, in a way that shows high and low areas of land: Pinned to the wall was a huge contoured map. The map is GPS-compatible and fully contoured.
More examplesFewer examplesWhite mica crystallinity surveys yielded contoured maps for the Lower Palaeozoic strata of rock.The peeler is contoured to the shape of your hand.The camera unit is ergonomically contoured for a comfortable feel.These jeans are more contoured and have lower slanting back pockets.
